addr: 30 East 33rd Street. 5th Floor. New York, NY 10016
title: First Monday Policy Briefing
desc:
Upcoming First Monday Policy Briefings: 
 
 
 
 Mon., December 7th: The opioid crisis and its impacts on Homeless New Yorkers 
 
 
 
 Join Care for the Homeless for our First Monday Policy Briefing series, a monthly presentation and discussion on issues of poverty, homelessness, housing and health in New York City. Light refreshments provided and open and free to the public.
